io.netty.channel

类 ChannelOption<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.util.AbstractConstant<ChannelOption<T>>
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelOption<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - the type of the value which is valid for the ChannelOption
    所有已实现的接口:
    Constant<ChannelOption<T>>, Comparable<ChannelOption<T>>

    public class ChannelOption<T>
extends AbstractConstant<ChannelOption<T>>
    A ChannelOption allows to configure a ChannelConfig in a type-safe way. Which ChannelOption is supported depends on the actual implementation of ChannelConfig and may depend on the nature of the transport it belongs to.

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static boolean exists(String name)
      Returns true if a ChannelOption exists for the given name.
      static <T> ChannelOption<T> newInstance(String name)
      Creates a new ChannelOption for the given name or fail with an IllegalArgumentException if a ChannelOption for the given name exists.
      void validate(T value)
      Validate the value which is set for the ChannelOption.
      static <T> ChannelOption<T> valueOf(Class<?> firstNameComponent, String secondNameComponent)
      Shortcut of valueOf(firstNameComponent.getName() + "#" + secondNameComponent).
      static <T> ChannelOption<T> valueOf(String name)
      Returns the ChannelOption of the specified name.

      • AUTO_CLOSE

        @Deprecated
public static final ChannelOption<Boolean> AUTO_CLOSE
        已过时。 Auto close will be removed in a future release. If true then the Channel is closed automatically and immediately on write failure. The default value is true.

                                           String secondNameComponent)
        Shortcut of valueOf(firstNameComponent.getName() + "#" + secondNameComponent).

      • exists

        public static boolean exists(String name)
        Returns true if a ChannelOption exists for the given name.

      • newInstance

        public static <T> ChannelOption<T> newInstance(String name)
        Creates a new ChannelOption for the given name or fail with an IllegalArgumentException if a ChannelOption for the given name exists.

      • validate

        public void validate(T value)
        Validate the value which is set for the ChannelOption. Sub-classes may override this for special checks.
